# Installation

The [`proj.verse`](https://github.com/edwardlavender/proj.verse) family of packages can be installed with: 

```{r, eval = FALSE}
install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("edwardlavender/proj.verse", 
                         dependencies = TRUE)
```
